title: The existing authorised structures should be tolerated
clause_text: The existing authorised structures should be tolerated. However, only repairs to such existing structures should be allowed in future and no reconstruction or new construction should be allowed in the Green Belt.
section: Development around Hazardous Industries (Chemical Zone Areas)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
